effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its
target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
